Your lifestyle sound

01

About us

Probass it is all about sound and hands free communication.

It is a young brand with the young team. “Miro Angel” is an innovative startup with main office located in LA, California. We are cooperating with lead young designs and technical specialists all over the world to create our products; with reliable factories in Asia to produce our earphones; with strong distributors to deliver our products since 2010.

Active rhythm of everyday life advises us the core product range in probass portfolio. Everybody can find the right earphone.

02

We create for you

  • MX101
  • MX102
  • MX201

Once we have decided to make something simple, but special and have created probass products. It wasn’t such shot, as it is described in one sentence. It takes some month to build the product concept, give the name and create personal style, design.
We are working only with reliable suppliers and proud of our quality. The shape is always important for earphones, but the sound is the core issue for products related to music. Probass is cooperating with young designers to create the style and pay attention to each product component. Innovative R&D team insures the sound.

Clear simple sound for everyday music in your life - it is all about probass.

03

Mx101 - Trendy ESSENTIALS

Basic earphones, created for people who prefer severe, essential things. Nothing extra, only sound and in classical shape.

    Available colors:

  • Black

  • White

    Acoustic quality:
  • Speaker size 10 mm
  • Frequency range 20 Hz - 20 kHz
  • Sensivity 98dB / nW
  • Power 10 mW
  • Resistance - 32 Ohm
    Product specification:
  • Light and convenient vaccum earphone with a remote control button
  • Compatible with all snarthphones (Android, iOS, etc.) CTIA headset pinout
  • Flat cable with a clip for fixing
  • Player control panel
    Features:
  • The package includes three additional size of ear cups (S,M,L)
  • Cabel length 1.2 m
  • Headphone type: Liners
  • Microphone construction: Located on a cable
  • Cable: flat, double-sided
04

Mx102 straipe - colored mood

Earphones, created for young and active people. Life has a lot of gray so as much bringht stuff you can bring into your life, as much funny and enjoyable life you can get. Be bright, be colored and have fun.

Available colors:

  • Sharkskin

  • White

  • Bodacious

05

MX201 Metal – Gorgeous flickering

Classic design in advanced material. The range of basic metal colors allows matching any style requirements. Matt finish gives gorgeous flickering and special look.

Available colors:

  • Aluminium

  • Graphite

  • Gold

  • Brown

  • Smoke Blue

  • Lilac

    Acoustic quality:
  • Speaker size 10 mm
  • Frequency range 20 Hz - 20 kHz
  • Sensivity 93dB / nW
  • Power 10 mW
  • Resistance - 32 Ohm
    Product specification:
  • Light and convenient vaccum earphone with a remote control button
  • Compatible with all snarthphones (Android, iOS, etc.) CTIA headset pinout
  • Flat cable with a clip for fixing
  • Player control panel
    Features:
  • The package includes three additional size of ear cups (S,M,L)
  • Cabel length 1.2 m
  • Headphone type: Liners
  • Microphone construction: Located on a cable
  • Cable: flat, double-sided
